name: Steven King
bio:
Steven King known force in Chicago comedy who has opened for comedians like Tim Heidecker (Tim & Eric) and Eric Andre (Adult Swim). He has been featured on several comedy festivals in the country such as Limestone Comedy Fest, and Riot LA. Famous New York comedy site, The Interrobang, said "[Steven King] blew everyone away, and if you donâ€™t know him already, find him, watch him and love him." He most recently performed my Kanye West Parody Show, "Steezus: Life of
Papa John," at the the Comedy Central Stage.
